Title: Savage Orruk Arrowboys
Legend: Arrowboys favour Mork’s kunnin’ tactics, and they take joy in pincushioning their foes while their backs are turned. Mobs of Arrowboys will stick a monster full of sharp projectiles from a distance before closing in to finish them off with sharp bone shivs.
Intro: Each model in a Savage Orruk Arrowboys unit is armed with a Stinga Bow and Bone Shiv.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Kunnin’ Rukk • Da Snorter’s Kop Rukk

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Savage Arrow Boss. Replace that model’s Bone Shiv with a Chompa.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Bone Totem Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Bone Totem Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Skull Thumper. You can add 1 to charge rolls for a unit that includes any Skull Thumpers.

Rules.Name: Aim Fer Its Eyes
Rules.Fluff: Arrowboys have great experience in bringing down monstrous beasts at range with their Stinga Bows.
Rules.Rule: Improve the Rend characteristic of an attack made with a Stinga Bow by 1 if the target is a MONSTER.
